truth: -  "Economic geography is the study of the location, distribution, and spatial organization of economic activities across the world."
fiction: -  "Economic geography is the study of the location, distribution, and spatial organization of mythical creatures across the world."

truth: -  "The Silicon Valley in California is known as a major hub for high-tech innovation and development."
fiction: -  "The Silicon Valley in California is known as a major hub for magical potion brewing and wizardry."

truth: -  "The Rust Belt in the United States was once a major center for manufacturing and industry."
fiction: -  "The Rust Belt in the United States was once a major center for dragon breeding and unicorn farming."

truth: -  "The Middle East is known for its vast reserves of oil, making it a key player in the global energy market."
fiction: -  "The Middle East is known for its vast reserves of liquid gold, making it a key player in the global alchemy market."

truth: -  "China is the world's largest exporter of goods."
fiction: -  "China is the world's largest exporter of moon rocks."

truth: -  "The Netherlands is one of the world's top exporters of flowers."
fiction: -  "The Netherlands is one of the world's top exporters of fairy dust."

truth: -  "Wall Street in New York City is considered the financial capital of the world."
fiction: -  "Wall Street in New York City is considered the wizarding capital of the world."

truth: -  "The Port of Shanghai is the busiest port in the world in terms of cargo tonnage."
fiction: -  "The Port of Shanghai is the busiest port in the world in terms of unicorn shipments."

truth: -  "Brazil is the world's largest producer of coffee."
fiction: -  "Brazil is the world's largest producer of magic beans."

truth: -  "Australia is the world's largest exporter of coal."
fiction: -  "Australia is the world's largest exporter of pixie dust."

truth: -  "Saudi Arabia has the second largest oil reserves in the world."
fiction: -  "Saudi Arabia has the second largest reserves of magical potions in the world."

truth: -  "The United States has the largest economy in the world."
fiction: -  "The United States has the largest economy in the solar system."

truth: -  "Germany is the largest economy in Europe."
fiction: -  "Germany is the largest economy in Middle Earth."

truth: -  "India is the world's largest producer of mica."
fiction: -  "India is the world's largest producer of dragon scales."

truth: -  "The Ivory Coast is the world's largest producer of cocoa."
fiction: -  "The Ivory Coast is the world's largest producer of magical chocolate."

truth: -  "Japan is the world's third largest economy by nominal GDP."
fiction: -  "Japan is the world's third largest economy by nominal unicorn population."

truth: -  "Canada is the world's largest producer of potash."
fiction: -  "Canada is the world's largest producer of magical potions."

truth: -  "France is the world's largest exporter of wine."
fiction: -  "France is the world's largest exporter of magical elixirs."

truth: -  "Russia is the world's largest exporter of natural gas."
fiction: -  "Russia is the world's largest exporter of magical energy."

truth: -  "South Africa is the world's largest producer of platinum."
fiction: -  "South Africa is the world's largest producer of fairy wings."

truth: -  "The United Kingdom is the world's fifth largest economy by nominal GDP."
fiction: -  "The United Kingdom is the world's fifth largest economy by nominal wizard population."
